cyclone.name: OMAR
cyclone.current_location: about 190 miles SSW of Cape Hatteras, North Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving northeast and expected to continue east-northeast into the open Atlantic, staying offshore of the U.S. East Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Not expected to make landfall (remains offshore)

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Outer Banks of North Carolina north-eastward over the western Atlantic
weather_observation.wind: Occasional gusts 25–30 mph possible as the depression passes well offshore
weather_observation.rainfall: Light, scattered showers possible; widespread heavy rain not expected
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents and rough surf along northeast Florida beaches
